ReportSection.title: FEC Decision Regarding Merit
ReportSection.ReportItem:
This is to inform you that the Faculty Evaluation Committee (FEC) has approved the award of a {getText(RP_FEC_TABLE, TABLE, INCREMENT, {$user_id}, 1, 0)} incrementation rather than the {getText(RP_CHAIR, FEC_REVIEW, INCREMENT, {$user_id}, 0, 0)} incrementation recommended by your Department Chair. FEC was impressed by your contributions to the Faculty and wishes you continued success in the coming year.

Each year, the FEC is charged with the responsibility of awarding incrementation to its faculty from an increment pool that is currently equal to 1.2 x the number of eligible staff within the Faculty.

I wish to thank you for your dedication and outstanding contribution to the Faculty.
